item.title: Target Just Made an Announcement That Investors Hate. It Did the Right Thing
item.description: When Target announced that COO Michael Fiddelke will replace CEO Brian Cornell, stock prices plummeted. Wall Street is wrong.

item.title: Want to Know How Long You’ll Live? Science Says These Simple Tests Predict Lifespan (and Assess Your Current Overall Health)
item.description: Best of all, each provides a path towards increasing your longevity and improving your overall health.

item.title: Your Employees Can Now Vibe Code With Anthropic’s Claude, for a Price
item.description: Anthropic is bringing Claude Code to its Teams and Enterprise plans.

item.title: A New Kind of Labubu Is Launching, Bringing Pop Mart Closer to $4 Billion in Revenue
item.description: The Chinese toymaker is capitalizing on the runaway success of its ugly-cute Labubu dolls.

item.title: Target Just Changed Its Leadership. Some Say It’s Not a Great Sign
item.description: After the company announced its next CEO, shares of the Minneapolis-based retailer dropped.
